page.title: 08GLOSSOPDALE PASTIMES
page.content: The{Cubs}are a group formed in 1908. The Hollingworth Cubs meet on Tuesday night at 6.45 and finish at 8.15. The pack is divided into sixes led by a sixer and a seconder. We begin with a{ {Grand Howl}and afterwards play games. On dry nights we go out to play rounders and other games. We also take badges; three of these are called Arrows - Bronze, Silver and Gold. There are Interest Badges like First Aid, Collector, Athlete and Home Help. {Horseriding}In my spare time I go up to the farm to ride my horse{Misty. He is 24 years old which is old for a horse. In summer he stays out in the field and I don't have to muck out his stable. My horse has just been{shod; he lost all his shoes in the field. I take him to the{Pony Club}to watch other riders. I don't ride because I'm not good enough yet.
